title: Sarah Ruhl and Rebecca Taichman on Conjuring ‘Becky Nurse of Salem’
description: Their new Off Broadway play, a dark comedy about power, inheritance and, of course, witchcraft, is now in previews at Lincoln Center Theater.
dc:creator: Alexis Soloski
media:credit: Erik Tanner for The New York Times
media:description: “There were crowds chanting ‘Lock her up,’ and there was my wanting to be in dialogue with ‘The Crucible,’” Sarah Ruhl, above left, with the director Rebecca Taichman, said of writing her new play, “Becky Nurse of Salem.”
